parameters.x: 3DCamera.LayerToLayerX(LAYER_Main, LAYER_UI, fBlurbSpawners.X, fBlurbSpawners.Y, fBlurbSpawners.ZElevation + Self.zOffset + Self.Tween.Value(TWEEN_Blurb_ZElevation))
parameters.y: 3DCamera.LayerToLayerY(LAYER_Main, LAYER_UI, fBlurbSpawners.X, fBlurbSpawners.Y, fBlurbSpawners.ZElevation + Self.zOffset + Self.Tween.Value(TWEEN_Blurb_ZElevation))
